Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.cluster

Visualizers for clustering results based on 2D projections.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterHullVisualization
    Visualizer for generating an SVG-Element containing the convex hull / alpha shape of each cluster.
    ClusterHullVisualization.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    ClusterMeanVisualization
    Visualize the mean of a KMeans-Clustering
    ClusterOrderVisualization
    Cluster order visualizer: connect objects via the spanning tree the cluster order represents.
    ClusterStarVisualization
    Visualize the mean of a KMeans-Clustering using stars.
    EMClusterVisualization
    Visualizer for generating SVG-Elements containing ellipses for first, second and third standard deviation.
    VoronoiVisualization
    Visualizer drawing Voronoi cells for k-means clusterings.
    VoronoiVisualization.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VoronoiVisualization.Mode
    Visualization mode.
